caption.center: J.R. PARRISH, et al., Petitioners v. HONORABLE RONALD IBARRA, CIRCUIT
COURT JUDGE OF THE THIRD CIRCUIT, STATE OF HAWAI`I, Respondent.

opinion.attorneys:
William C. McCorriston, for petitioners Nonparty Hokuli'a Property Owners on the writ.
Jeffrey N. Watanabe, for joinder petitioners.
opinion.opinion_byline: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, ACOBA, and DUFFY, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Upon consideration of Petitioners' petition for a writ of mandamus or other appropriate relief, the joinder in the petition, and the records and files herein, it appears that: (1) Petitioners seek review of the judgment entered in Kelly v. 1250Oceanside Partners, Civil No. 00-1-0192K; (2) the judgment entered Kelly v. 1250 Oceanside Partners, is the subject of Appeal No. 26813; and (3) Petitioners fail to demonstrate that they are entitled to a writ of mandamus. Therefore,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the petition for a writ of mandamus is denied without prejudice to Petitioners seeking leave to file an amicus curiae brief in Appeal No. 26813.
